column4: Overland: Hey, something I know! Well, you could piece them together, frame by frame.
Any one of a number of video-editing programs could do that.
Yes - 'any of a number of video eding programs' - but i've never done video editing in *nix - usually I'd use VirtualDub in win32, but NO WAY
Well, I've love to tell you something specific, but my experience with *nix is about thirty-six hours.
